guardians.controllers

Class ShiftConfigurationController

  • java.lang.Object
    • guardians.controllers.ShiftConfigurationController

  • @RestController
 @RequestMapping(value="/doctors/shift-configs")
public class ShiftConfigurationController
extends java.lang.Object
    The ShiftConfigurationController will handle all requests related to the shift configuration of doctors
    Author:
    miggoncan

    • Method Detail

      • checkValidShiftPreferences

        private void checkValidShiftPreferences(ShiftConfiguration shiftConf)
        This method checks that the given AllowedShift in the ShiftConfiguration are valid. This is, they all exist in the database, and the given id corresponds to the given shift
        Parameters:
        shiftConf - The ShiftConfiguration that will be checked
        Throws:
        AllowedShiftNotFoundException - if one of the AllowedShift was not found in the database
        InvalidEntityException - if one of the AllowedShift's id does not correspond with its shift

      • getValidShiftConfiguration

        private ShiftConfiguration getValidShiftConfiguration(ShiftConfigurationPublicDTO shiftConfDTO)
        This method will convert a ShiftConfigurationPublicDTO to a valid ShiftConfiguration
        Parameters:
        shiftConfDTO -
        Returns:
        Throws:
        InvalidShiftConfigurationException - if the ShiftConfigurationPublicDTO canont be converted to a valid ShiftConfiguration

      • getShitfConfigurations

        @GetMapping(value="")
public org.springframework.hateoas.CollectionModel<org.springframework.hateoas.EntityModel<ShiftConfigurationPublicDTO>> getShitfConfigurations()
        This method handles GET requests for the complete list of ShiftConfiguration
        Returns:
        A collection with all the ShiftConfiguration available in the database

      • newShiftConfiguration

        @PostMapping(value="")
public org.springframework.hateoas.EntityModel<ShiftConfigurationPublicDTO> newShiftConfiguration(@RequestBody
                                                                                                                         ShiftConfigurationPublicDTO newShiftConfDTO)
        This method handles requests to create a ShiftConfiguration for an already existent Doctor
        Parameters:
        newShiftConfDTO - the new ShiftConfiguration that will be persisted
        Returns:
        The persisted ShiftConfiguration
        Throws:
        DoctorNotFoundException - if the ShiftConfiguration#getDoctorId() is not found in the database
        ShiftConfigurationAlreadyExistsException - if the Doctor with id ShiftConfiguration#getDoctorId() already has a ShiftConfiguration

      • getShitfConfiguration

        @GetMapping(value="/{doctorId}")
public org.springframework.hateoas.EntityModel<ShiftConfigurationPublicDTO> getShitfConfiguration(@PathVariable
                                                                                                                                   java.lang.Long doctorId)
        This method handles GET requests for the ShiftConfiguration of one precise Doctor
        Parameters:
        doctorId - The id of the Doctor
        Returns:
        The corresponding ShiftConfiguration
        Throws:
        ShiftConfigurationNotFoundException

      • updateShiftConfiguration

        @PutMapping(value="/{doctorId}")
public org.springframework.hateoas.EntityModel<ShiftConfigurationPublicDTO> updateShiftConfiguration(@PathVariable
                                                                                                                                      java.lang.Long doctorId,
                                                                                                                                      @RequestBody
                                                                                                                                      ShiftConfigurationPublicDTO shiftConfigDTO)
        This method handles requests to update the existing ShiftConfiguration of an existing Doctor
        Parameters:
        doctorId - The id of the Doctor whose ShiftConfiguration wants to be updated
        shiftConfigDTO - The desired value of the ShiftConfiguration
        Returns:
        the saved ShiftConfiguration
        Throws:
        DoctorNotFoundException
        ShiftConfigurationNotFoundException - if the Doctor with doctorId does not already have a ShiftConfiguration. In this case, the request newShiftConfiguration(ShiftConfigurationPublicDTO) should be used
        AllowedShiftNotFoundException - if one of the AllowedShift in the shift preferences does not already exist
        InvalidEntityException - if id and shift in any of the given AllowedShift in the shift preferences do not match
